title: FPS uncapped but won't go above 60
body: I just got a new PC (designed specifically for gaming), and my fps will not go above 60. My laptop which would usually cap out at just above 100fps will also not go higher than 60. My friends that I play with have also noticed a similar issue.

replies.body:
Sometimes, when your pc is too good, you can actually run into some FPS issues.  As a start, check our our [high spec pc guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs), and try capping your frame rate in-game to see if that helps. 

Should the issue continue, run through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case any outdated drivers or even game files gets in the way.
